title: REMOVE_ALL_PED_WEAPONS
content:
0xA44CE817// RemoveAllPedWeapons
void REMOVE_ALL_PED_WEAPONS(Ped ped, BOOL p1);Parameters:ped: The ped entityp1: Parameter p1 does not seem to be used or referenced in game binaries.\
Note: When called for networked entities, a CRemoveAllWeaponsEvent will be created per request.This is the server-side RPC native equivalent of the client native REMOVE_ALL_PED_WEAPONS.
codeBlocks:
// RemoveAllPedWeapons
void REMOVE_ALL_PED_WEAPONS(Ped ped, BOOL p1);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
-- Example usage for REMOVE_ALL_PED_WEAPONS
RemoveAllPedWeapons(ped, false)
